comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Hough came in second, and Jackie Collins (on Hough's left) first."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content:
Tidbit: ;)

Larry Hough's shooting technique is the origin of the expression "knuckle down" (heard by countless boys from their fathers -- mine included ;)

Players put the knuckle of their index finger on the ground and place the shooter (marble) in the crook of their index finger. You then flick it out with your thumb.
